name: elpjhmop

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ ran(projh), c0 ∈ HrmOp, (c0 ∘ c0)= c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wcel(c0, cho))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→ c0 ∈ HrmOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)↔(c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧(c0 ∘ c0)= c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wcel(c0, cho))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→ c0 ∈ HrmOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)↔(c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧(c0 ∘ c0)= c0))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))

comment: A projection operator is Hermitian. Part of Theorem 26.1 of [Halmos] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
